key_channel_insights.line_content: Over 70% of fares matched the airline website, though short-haul itineraries showed greater price shifts.
78% matched overall; nearly half of long-haul fares were cheaper than the airline site.
Matched fares rose to 52%, but around 47% remain higher compared to the website.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: Over 70% of fares in the latest week mirrored the website, demonstrating strong price alignment.
Nearly one-fifth priced higher on short-haul routes, while long-haul flights remained over 90% matched.
OTA-lower fares appeared in around 9% of itineraries last week, centered on short-haul flights.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Remains minimal at about 1% overall, reflecting consistent OTA listings for most routes.
Dominated at roughly 72% in the latest week, indicating continued price parity.
Peaked near 30% previously but eased to about 18% last week, showing a downward correction.
Near 9% last week, with short-haul seeing a slight increase from prior data.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: 70% matched, 19% OTA-higher, and a small uptick in OTA-lower.
94% matched, almost no OTA-lower, and less than 5% OTA-higher.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 75% matched; OTA-higher dropped from above 30% to around 16% recently.
Approximately 60% matched, 26% OTA-higher, and around 11–14% OTA-lower.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: OTA-higher at 19% last week, down from a spike, with a slightly increased OTA-lower share.
78% matched, with a brief rise above 30% OTA-higher reverting closer to 16%.

mse_highlights.line_content: Over 78% matched last week, a stable trend compared to previous periods.
Nearly half of long-haul fares were cheaper than the airline website, short-haul mostly matched or slightly higher.
20% of far-out itineraries priced higher on MSE, with only 15% for close-in.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Remains negligible at 0.13%, slightly up from 0.11%.
78.44% last week, holding steady from prior data.
16.61%, down from 19.50%, averaging a 10% premium over the website.
4.82%, up slightly from 4.43%, offering around a 15% discount.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: 53% matched, 47% lower, no higher fares reported.

mse_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 85% matched, 14% higher, 1% lower, maintaining strong alignment.
54% matched, 27% higher, 19% lower, showing wider variability.

mse_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: 80% matched, 15% higher, 5% lower for near-term itineraries.
76% matched, 20% higher, 4% lower, indicating a premium on longer horizons.

gds_highlights.line_content: Matched fares rose from 41% to 52%, signaling improved alignment.
47% remain higher on GDS, a slight decline from earlier weeks.
GDS-lower fares are under 1%, showing limited underpricing.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Less than 1% of fares, unchanged from prior observation.
Matched fares range 39–74%, with short haul rising to about 51%.
Covers 40–60% of itineraries, declining on short haul but stable on long haul.
Remains below 1%, slightly higher in non-CA markets.

gds_summary_by_region.line_content: 74% matched, 26% higher, no lower fares observed.

gds_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 58% matched, 40% higher, and up to 4% channel-lower.

gds_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: 60% matched, 40% higher, negligible lower fares, minimal not-found.
37% matched, 63% higher, 0.4% lower, very few not-found cases.
